nodes.title: In 2 Days Our Voices Head to the Senate
nodes.description:
Good Afternoon Supporters

In 2 days I have a meeting set with Sen Hassan’s staff. That means I NEED your help now more than ever! Strength comes in unity! Please help me circulating this petition by any means available for mass exposure. 
As always I’m humbled by your support! Let’s do this!!!

Amber

nodes.title: Big News We’re Finally Getting Heard
nodes.description:
�BIG NEWS�
After several weeks of reaching out I’ve finally been contacted by someone in Sen Hassan’s office about my petition and how she can help in getting Veteran’s voices heard on voting rights!

We’re currently 553�But I need Everyone’s help to get mass exposure on this today! We’ve come so far but still have a mission ahead of us!!

Together we will rise!

Amber

nodes.title: I Won’t Stop on my Mission~But I Need Your Help!
nodes.description:
Happy 4th of July to all of my Supporters 

I am humbled by my 414 co-signers and to all who’ve amplified my message to Congress.

 I won’t & can’t stop! As a Veteran my oath to the Constitution and the American people never expires.

 I continue to try and get media coverage for my petition as well as a face to face meeting with my Democratic Senators to push them on the For the People Act and John Lewis Voting Rights Act.

This is even more urgent after failed Senate vote and the Supreme Court ruling last week that further weakened the Voting Rights Act.

We need a filibuster carve out for democracy because certainly the right of all Americans to vote is as important as budgets, cabinet picks and judges. Voting is a constitutional right that must be protected at all costs!

Can you please take a moment to share my petition on all of your platforms so I can meet the next 500 signature goal, to let the media and Congress know how serious we are!

 Thank you & Happy 4th of July 

Amber

nodes.title: Help me make some Major Noise
nodes.description:
Good Morning Fellow Voting Rights Defenders, 
To everyone that has helped me with my petition, my eternal thanks 

Throughout my Marine Corps career I never could have imagined that I would see our democracy under assault by fellow Americans. I served for the rights of all Americans, regardless of race, gender, age or political affiliation, and the right to vote is the very bedrock of our democracy.

Now that I have 280 co-signers my plan is to get further attention so the voice of Veteran’s, who served, sacrificed and died for the rights under assault can be heard in the halls of Congress.

I have reached out to news outlets and to have a face-to-face meeting with my Senators while they are home on break.

The more co-signers I have the better my chances. Can you please help one more time and share with your friends across your social media platforms and elsewhere. Because United we stand!!!

 Thank you 

Amber

https://www.change.org/VetOpenLetter-VotingRights

nodes.title: Ready to Keep Fighting for Democracy? Keep the Momentum Going!
nodes.description:
Hi all, things are heating up �We just passed 265 signatures on our petition to demand voting rights for all Americans. Thank you so much for standing with me!! Will you help me one more time by sharing this petition with ten other people? If we stand together we can't be ignored. Here's a link to share http://chng.it/KSPxNpwNyg
Together we rise, and United We Stand!           Amber

nodes.title: Let’s take this campaign to the next level
nodes.description:
Hi all, I just wanted to reach out to let you know we’ve just passed 214 signatures on our petition! Thank you so much for your support! Also a HUGE thank you to everyone who’s donated to get this petition seen by even more American’s who believe in voting rights. I am working hard with a team of veterans behind the scenes to gather even more signatures so I can the media’s attention to get our voice heard by all 100 US Senators. 
You’ve already done so much for me but will you help me one more time to get more support by sharing this petition with ten other people? If enough of us sign we can’t be ignored!

Thank You, Amber

Here’s a link to share https://www.change.org/p/charles-e-schumer-veterans-open-letter-us-senate-in-support-of-voting-rights-for-all-americans
